>ç‰ˆæœ¬æ›´æ–°æ—¥å¿—[è‹±æ–‡]

Please note change DisguiseCraft to Lib's Disguise and also remove your files to be sure everything works fine!!!
= Change log =

Version: 0.1.7_BETA

+ Added way to require inventory empty on join. (Configurable)+ Added permission so you could do all commands in-game.+ Added shop signs.+ Added broadcast message on seeker spawn.+ Added ability to hide as a Flower Pot.+ Added the BlockHuntPass.+ Added permission for "Block Chooser".* Fixed bug flying disable/enable not working good.* Fixed being kicked for too long names in the scoreboard.* Fixed NPE in shop.* Players now cannot take their diguise block off their head.* * Fixed bug potion effects are not getting removed after join.* Fixed being able to use EXP on anvils and enchantment tables.* Fixed bug seeker kept items from lobby.* Fixed players able to die in lava, etc.~ Changed some names in messages.yml.


Version: 0.1.6_BETA

+ Added Custom Graph for MCStats.* Fixed player won't fly in arena if they where able before.* Fixed bug message being sent to wrong player.* Fixed selection wand not showing right numbers.* Fixed bug being able to become a "book" with the BlockChooser.~ Engine update.~ Changed to BETA status.~ Changed package name of MCStats.~ Updated Bukkit version to 1.6.4.~ Engine update.~ Changed from DisguiseCraft to LibsDisguises.


Version: 0.1.5_ALPHA

+ Added tokens set/take/add command.+ Added ability to change the scoreboard's title and shops's title.+ Added way to disable the scoreboard.+ Added way to change scoreboard title.* Attempt fix warps removal on restart?* Fixed no more spam on list command.* Fixed setting killToken won't save.~ Updated engine.


Version: 0.1.4_ALPHA

+ Added shop!+ Added a delay on getting a sword as hider.+ Added ability to change the scoreboard contents.+ Added sound on countdown.+ Added a start command.+ Added a list command.+ Added message when ProtocolLib is not installed.* Fixed bug being unable to put in Blocks when using Chest commands.* Attempt fix selection wand not showing location.* Fixed unable to die when not moving. You'll become unsolid faster.* Attempt to fix signs not working when having a custom look.~ Changed the plugin description. Thanks to AidanOrlando.* Fixed bug blocks becoming solid in non-air blocks.- Ender signal sound on hit.


Version: 0.1.3_ALPHA

+ Attempt to add an auto updater. Not sure if it works...+ Added remove command.* Attempt fix starting up MCStats bug.* Fix bug arena won't start.* ALLOT of bug fixes. Can't split them!~ Changed hit sound.~ Scoreboard now only shows while ingame. And won't flash on lag.


Version: 0.1.2_ALPHA

+ Added abillity to become solid in water!+ Made an instant respawn system.* Attempt to fix bug trying to join a game.* Attempt to fix bug still items while no more ingame.


Version: 0.1.1_ALPHA

+ Added message when new seeker has been choosen.+ Added scoreboard.+ Added option per arena to allowed certain commands. (Editable in arenas file!)~ Combined ArenaSerializable with the Arena class. (Less code!)~ Changed In-game sign. (Requires new Config.yml!)* Blocks can't attack each other anymore.* No spamming "hitted" sound in lobby.* No EXP drop on death.* Fixed rechosen seeker "still block" bug.* Fixed sign bug not showing countdown.* Attempt to fix bug keeping items from seeker after end.* Better solid blocks! (It does like the hives right now! ;3)* Fixed bug while dropping your block.* Fixed more bugs...


Version: 0.1.0_ALPHA

First release.
